title: FireBreathingRubberDucks Recruiting
body: At the moment we have 6 players i believe and looking to expand even more, we just started so we have only completed 2 placement matchs both wins. We arent looking for any role in particular but the team will only accept silver or higher and being that most of the members would like to use skype for communication it would be good that you had skype. Anyway feel free to add me if you are interested

replies.body: I am not sure exactly xD i mean this is a team recruitment forum and all i am doing is promoting the team
